This [fish shell](https://fishshell.com/docs/current/cmds/function.html)
function gets the name of current [tmux](https://github.com/tmux/tmux/wiki)
sessions and pipes the session names into the
[fzf](https://github.com/junegunn/fzf) prompt. The user is attached to the the
`tmux` session selected in `fzf`.

```fish
function tma
    set sessions (tmux ls -F '#{session_name}')
    set session (printf %s\n $sessions | fzf --prompt="î¯ˆ Tmux session " --height=50% --layout=reverse --border --exit-0)
    if set -q TMUX
        set tmux_cmd switchc
        echo "In a tmux session: $TMUX"
    else
        set tmux_cmd attach
        echo "Not in a TMUX session"
    end
    tmux $tmux_cmd -t $session
end
```
